verbs.description: [ARG1: attack in afghanistan] [V: is] [ARG2: a reminder of formidable task the assassination of afghan leaders in kandahar province wo n't lessen u s support for the war in afghanistan or deter local security forces in the fight aga army gen scott miller afghanistan u s commander attack afghan government taliban america]
